tutorial.speak:
On the Songs tab of the Serving section you will find all the songs in your churches library.
You can add a new song by clicking the Add Song button. Type in the song title and click search.
Select a song from the search results to add it to your library.
This will take you to the song details page with some information automatically loaded.
The right pane contains facts about the song which are shared across all churches. The rest of the page is specific to your church.
The shared data includes external links to popular services with more data about the song.
All of this data is editable by the community.
Lyrics and chord charts are subject to copyright and are not provided by ChurchApps. You can manually provide these by uploading files or entering text.
If you have a PraiseCharts account you can link it to have this data auto-populate. To do so go to your profile
There you will see a button to link PraiseCharts.
Click the Authorize App button to link your account.
When you return to the song details page you will see links to all the PraiseCharts resources you have access to for this song and key.
If you have at least one product, you can also import the lyrics automatically.
It's possible to add multiple keys for the same song. Click the Add link.
Enter the new key and any notes you wish and click Save.
You can now have separate files for each key. Any files available from PraiseCharts will be automatically loaded.
You can also add other arrangements of the same song. Click the Add Arrangement link.
You will be shown a list of other recordings of this song. Choosse one, or scroll to the bottom of the list to manually create your own.
The new arrangement will be added with separate file, lyrics and keys.
